value:
$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The tempest is creating chaos in
space-time. If we do nothing, this
world will end. Lend me your aid!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|Seriously?! That's bad! We have
to do something!$k$pBut first... You're Lucina, aren't you?
What are you doing here?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_SpringFes21,Face|Can't fool us! As if we would so easily
forget a friend we fought side by side
with for so long.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|N-no, I— My name is Marth! Now,
a terrible disaster is threatening
this world...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|All right, fine. If you really want to
keep up the act, whatever. You can
do what you want.$k$pBut is this disaster of yours related to
the guys coming out of that vortex?
Looks like they're up to no good...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_SpringFes21,Face|I'm not gonna let them ruin our
festival fun!$k$pYou can count on me, Lucin—er,
Marth! I'll protect the joy of spring!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|Guess I've got no choice... I'll help
too. But you owe me one, all right?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Thank you, Severa, Inigo...
Please, be careful.$k$pThat is, um, I appreciate your
assistance in this time of need.
Keep your wits about you.$k$p

$WmMPID_春祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_SpringFes21,Face|The vortex is fading away... Guess
that means we won, huh?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|Phew! I'm exhausted! Lucina—I mean,
Marth, we've done it!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Thank you... This world is safe
thanks to you. Now then, I must
be on my way. Good-bye.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|H-hey, just where do you think
you're going?! Wait a second!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I have many matters to attend to...
There are other vortexes in other
worlds that demand my attention.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|It's not like one just pops up right
after another one has disappeared,
is it?$k$pI mean, you're here during a festival
and all, so you might as well have
something to eat before you go.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_SpringFes21,Face|You're always trying to do everything
on your own—er...it seems. You ought
to take a break once in a while!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|I know you're trying to act cool, but
I bet you're tearing up underneath
that mask, aren't you? We know you!$k$pC'mon! There's all kinds of sweets
and everything. Don't tell me you
don't like sweets!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_SpringFes21,Face|If you stay, you'll get to see my new
springtime dance. I even wear the
ears and tail, so...it'll be worth it!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...Thank you, you two. Truly. Spring's
warmth touches more than just the
weather in Askr, it would appear.$k$p
